html:
1.15.19  8:49 pm   How can one find happiness while being alone? -Your fellow musician.

     write things which you plan to share with others

1.15.19  8:46 pm   can you play us some sad music?

     how about that 50s song 'oh where oh where could my baby be' hint: she died in a car crash i think

1.15.19  8:44 pm   any plans about hurling yourself back on schedule,

     yes

      and if so, how?

     i'm not sure

      i'm willing to bet you can do it

     the same schedule i was on before would work fine, but the problem is i am now hungry for more

1.15.19  8:29 pm   what's a good weeknight meal

      lunch!

1.15.19  8:11 pm   do u have any desire to elaborate on why the bird symbols felt right as the image of death and birth

     because the song is about flying

1.15.19  7:57 pm   how do i get through college without having a breakdown every single week?

     you can't but you can channel that into a ferocious creative output

1.15.19  7:56 pm   Is it here that I display my concerns about the government shutdown?

     sure

1.15.19  7:48 pm   Is patreon the best way to support you?

     it's pretty good

1.15.19  7:45 pm   Why do you have a broken doorbell? Wouldn't a not broken one be better?

     it's fake

1.15.19  7:18 pm   How do you feel when you write your songs?

     very good

1.15.19  7:08 pm   but did you enjoy your time at the airport terminal?

     yes

1.15.19  7:05 pm   how do you come up with these songs?

     usually i must let them come up with me

1.15.19  6:53 pm   do you have plans to release a video for "at the airport terminal"

     yes

1.15.19  6:17 pm   how to make someone tell the truth?

     do what they said you were gonna do

1.15.19  5:46 pm   how do you make a song "catchy"?

     i don't know but it's probably similar to cheering up a child

1.15.19  4:53 pm   you frequently advise people to figure out the things that happen in their favorite songs for inspiration and in order to learn how to create music of their own that they like. Would you ever consider releasing a playlist of songs that have inspired you in this way? I know you're reluctant to answer questions about single favorite songs, but maybe a longer playlist would omit fewer important things.

     would be way too long. like at least 5 digits. basically everything i've ever heard on the radio, plus some other things

1.15.19  4:37 pm   what do you think about all these people copystriking each other

     sounds like fun

1.15.19  4:34 pm   What is a scientist?

     a person

      Now look at your definition. Are you a scientist?

     well i suppose so

1.15.19  4:22 pm   have you ever had a dream

     could be having one now

1.15.19  4:03 pm   how do i find the predominant/"movement" chords of a particular key?...

     just see what everyone else is doing. it is not entirely clear what you call 'movement' ... you can call whichever ones movement you think feel like movement

1.15.19  3:13 pm   what kind of sad bad and mad glad scheme would you suggest in order for me to achieve my sad mad and bad glad dream?

     good

1.15.19  2:16 pm   9.27.18 9:20 pm garageband has quantization strength now. thanks for the tip btw

     set it around 50% or lower for loose feels, but if you want tight, still never set it higher than 90. this is to avoid weird sonic effects of all the percussion, kick, and snare, and everything, all happening at exactly the same time

1.15.19  2:03 pm   Why do you type without caps?

     why do you

1.15.19  1:45 pm   As a musician, should I try to get a record label deal, or just be independent.

     didn't even know record deals existed anymore

      The reason I ask this is because I've heard a con about being signed to a record label; that you have to make songs that will most likely sell and it would limit your ability to write new types of music. I've heard people calling this type of tactic "selling out".

I've also heard that artists that are signed to certain record labels do want to make new music and they probably have a bunch of songs they wrote but the record label won't let them record it because its not guaranteed the song would sell. I don't know. What do you think?

     if there was a way to guarantee a song will sell, surely everyone would be doing it

1.15.19  1:06 pm   are you more comfortable on camera now then you were a year ago?

     depends who the editor is, and whether or not it's me

1.15.19  12:53 pm   what's your opinions on trees?

     they are tall (some of them)

1.15.19  12:22 pm   are things cool and good?

     at least

1.15.19  12:19 pm   what inspired u to maek music

     music itself

1.15.19  11:29 am   I'm a musician who's just starting to write music. You're one of the most progressive musicians I've heard, so do you have any advice for making music sound more interesting, yet listen-able?

      keep listening to more and more music that's complicated or listenable, and when you stumble across something that is both, listen to that even more. learn how to play all of it. after about 50 to 100 songs of this you should start to assimilate its powers

1.15.19  10:48 am   how did you remember your lyrics for genius ???

     i did not

1.15.19  9:59 am   when was "at the airport terminal" written?

      the first line on nov 18, 2018. the rest on jan 3 and 4, 2019

1.15.19  9:25 am   do you think you'd ever get on youtube rewind?

     i was asked to do something for it but they already had the audio, they only wanted me to do the video. which is not my strong point if i can't control the audio

1.15.19  8:25 am   Why don't you post as much as you used to in the notes?

     because i've been posting much more in the audio/visual sections instead

1.15.19  8:24 am   Why do you never make music in a minor key?

     why do you never notice when i do

      I find that it always sounds better that way, but that's my personal opinion.

     that may be true

1.15.19  6:10 am   Have you ever thought about how "possesses" possesses so many "S"s? 

     yes

1.15.19  5:51 am   how do you deal with social interactions

     find something to be truthful about

1.15.19  5:07 am   what are you working on right now?

     questions

1.15.19  4:49 am   Is there a set date for when the video for "At The Airport Terminal" will be released?

     it was supposed to be jan 8

1.15.19  2:30 am   have you ever written a song outside of a writing session, like by inspiration,

     ideas hit me that way, but for an entire song to get completed and solidified i would need to sit down and sort it out, at some point

      and if so how fid that go

1.15.19  1:14 am   how do you find inspiration im really having trouble with that

     go from place to place. start out by going to the nearest accessible place which you have never been to

1.15.19  12:45 am   1.14.19  7:25 pm   maybe it would be worthwhile to indicate some how whether enter will be a line break or a submit at the current moment given the number of characters in the field. like change the button text between "ASK (or press enter)"

     sounds boring

      and "ASK" or something. the CHARACTERS_TO_DISALLOW_ENTER limit is hard to understand or rely on without reading the source code and counting the characters yourself

     it is supposed to accurately anticipate the expected behaviour the majority of the time, silently

1.14.19  10:40 pm   What genre would you say your music falls under? Experimental?

     normal

1.14.19  10:18 pm   Why is Do The Thing Song so relaxing to hear

     because i made it in a relaxing way. probably too relaxing, should check pulse

1.14.19  10:05 pm   Why post a song on Spotify before your website?

     by mistake

1.14.19  9:40 pm   What's good?

     hi

1.14.19  9:37 pm   Do you have any videos I could watch?

     i'll see what i can do

1.14.19  9:10 pm   do you write and record the songs and edit the song's video in 2 weeks?

     i did that 7 times in a row between aug 21 and nov 27, and since then i've been mostly doing it with some slight additional complications

      if so, why arent people praising you like a god?

     sometimes they do

1.14.19  9:08 pm   how do you feel about being hassled, whether at the castle or in the workplace?

     pretty good

1.14.19  8:52 pm   What's your religion (if your not open about that, it's ok.)

     i was wondering if we could combine them all somehow

1.14.19  8:41 pm   in airport terminal, you say "i'm eating porridge but i heated it to the wrong amount of time". was this based on a true experience you had, perhaps while writing the song?

     no
